list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He transferred the letter from his briefcase to his pocket.

list_definition.definition: to (cause to) move to another place, job, vehicle etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I’m transferring / They’re transferring me to the Bangkok office.

list_definition.definition: to give to another person, especially legally

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I intend to transfer the property to my son.

list_definition.definition: a design, picture etc that can be transferred from one surface to another, eg from paper to material as a guide for embroidery.
